name: AccessToCleanDrinkingWater
title: Access to Clean Drinking Water
description: Determination of whether and degree to which the person experiences limited or uncertain availability of clean drinking water (Business ID: Entry 743862)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Access to Clean Drinking Water.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an determination of whether and degree to which the person experiences limited or uncertain availability of clean drinking water.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMEDCT codes for Access to Clean Drinking Water.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Access to Clean Drinking Water.)
